ClinicalMeasureCriteriaGrp.name: ClinicalMeasureCriteriaGrp
ClinicalMeasureCriteriaGrp.description: Represents a group of computable criteria for a health-related measure. This object is available in API version 59.0 and later.

ClinicalMeasureId.description: The clinical measure that the criteria group belongs to.

Description.description: The description of the clinical measure criteria group.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced the record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed the record.

MeasureType.description: Specifies the measure type the criteria group belongs to based on what the measure calculates.

Name.description: The name of the clinical measure criteria group.

PopulationBasisTypeCodeId.description: Specifies the population basis type for a measure the criteria group belongs to, when the basis is different from the subject.

ProgramName.description: The program used for calculating the measure that the criteria group belongs to.

ProgramType.description: The type of program used for calculating the measure that the criteria group belongs to.

ScoreAggregationMethod.description: A description of the method used to combine the different measure scores of each population into one aggregated result.

ScoreImprovementIndication.description: Specifies whether an increase or decrease in score is the preferred result for the measure that the criteria group belongs to.

ScoringUnitId.description: Specifies the expected unit of measure for the measure score when the unit can't be inferred from the measure logic.

SubjectCategory.description: Specifies the subject category of the measure that the criteria group belongs to.
